meanings.definition: A feed of news updates or articles on a website or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: I checked my newsfeed for the latest updates on the website.
meanings.sent2: Her newsfeed on social media is always filled with interesting articles.
meanings.sent3: The newsfeed seemed to have a mind of its own, constantly updating with new stories.
meanings.sent4: The newsfeed acted like a never-ending newspaper, delivering news straight to my screen.
meanings.sent5: The newsfeed was like a digital newspaper, bringing fresh stories to my fingertips.

meanings.definition: To provide a continuous stream of news updates or articles on a website or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: She newsfeeds the website with daily articles to keep the readers engaged.
meanings.sent2: The social media platform newsfeeds information to users in real-time.
meanings.sent3: He newsfeeds the website tirelessly, ensuring a constant flow of updates.
meanings.sent4: The website newsfeeds like a well-oiled machine, delivering news seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: They newsfeed the platform with fresh content, keeping users informed and entertained.
